name: NBA 2K23: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Rise to the occasion and realize your full potential in NBA 2K23. Prove yourself against the best players in the world and showcase your talent in MyCareer or The W. Pair today's All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTeam Build a dynasty of your own as a GM, or lead the league in a new direction as the Commissioner in MyNBA. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in Play Now and experience true-to-life gameplay. How will you Answer The Call?
